```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

library(shinydashboard)
require(janitor)
```

```{r}
netflix %>% read_csv("data/netflix_titles.csv")
```


```{r}
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(titlePanel("Netflix App"),
                selectInput("x",
                            "Select Fill Variable",
                            choices=unique(netflix$listed_in),
                            selected="Documentaries"),
                selectInput("rating",
                            "Select Rating",
              choices = unique(netflix$rating),
              selected = unique(netflix$rating)[1]),
              
                 plotOutput("plot", width = "600px", height = "600px"))
  


server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
            netflix %>% 
             filter(listed_in==input$x, rating == input$rating) %>% 
             ggplot(aes(x=reorder(title, duration), y=duration))+
             geom_col(fill="steelblue", color="black", alpha=0.8)+
            coord_flip()
  })
  
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
